Name: Urban Bounty Hunter
Description: You have spent your life in the city, tracking down criminals and hunting fugitives for the local authorities. Though the work is dangerous, you have become adept at navigating the urban landscape and bringing justice to those who evade the law.

Skill Proficiency.1: Choose two from among Deception, Insight, Persuasion, and Stealth
Skill Proficiency.2: Choose two from among Deception, Insight, Persuasion, and Stealth

Tool Proficiency.1: Choose two from among one type of gaming set, one musical instrument, and thieves' toolst
Tool Proficiency.2: Choose two from among one type of gaming set, one musical instrument, and thieves' tools

Equipment.1: A set of clothes appropriate to your duties

Feature.Ear to the Ground: You are always in tune with the city's underworld. You can gather information about criminal activities, underworld contacts, and hidden safehouses. Additionally, you can use your action to make an Intelligence (Investigation) check to gather information about a specific individual or organization. On a successful check, you gain useful insights that can aid you in your pursuit of justice.
